## Style

Don't translate anything that is a technical term from R, for example, function names, objects and arguments (usually
between quotes).

```
invalid length(x)

length(x) अमान्य है
```

```
'MARGIN' does not match dim(X)

'MARGIN' dim(X) से मेल नहीं खाता
```

Words related to mathematics, statistics, engineering, etc will not be translated. However, a phonetic presentation will
be provided in Devnagri script along with the word in English script.

```
PORT must be specified

पोर्ट (PORT) का उल्लेख करना अनिवार्य है
```
